name: Infinite Archery
description:
Click and drag downards to fire your arrow - but watch out! You have no control over where you're aiming so time your shots right! Collect coins on your way up to potentially get extra lives and reach that high score.

This game was built for mobile, so performance may not be that great playing on the web. If you have an android phone I recommend using the link below to download the game to your device.
